name: Doorman Deluxe
description:
Play as an Ultimate Doorman and decide who gets in the club!

Every night your Club Manager gives you a guideline telling what kind of folks can get-in. If you perform well, you get to work another night. If you do bad... well let's just say you won't okay?

Press Right Arrow to let someone in

Press Left Arrow to make them go away

This game was made  for the for the 2 button game jam. If you would like to see this game further developed, please consider leaving a comment and let us know. We would love to hear any ideas, suggestions, or feedback you might have!

Credits:
